content.raw:
I think it would be nice to fix it in this PR... only if it turns out to be separate issue (e.g. unrelated issue with DART itself) I would suggest to handle it via an issue.

I have a few other things pop up on my TODO list that are pretty urgent before I get time to look at this again, but it shouldn't be long (probably on the weekend).
Meanwhile, if you can find a bit of time to keep testing, that would be awesome of course :) If there are any other issues, I can then handle them all in one go.

Thanks for testing this!

I think it would be nice to fix it in this PR... only if it turns out to be separate issue (e.g. unrelated issue with DART itself) I would suggest to handle it via an issue.

I have a few other things pop up on my TODO list that are pretty urgent before I get time to look at this again, but it shouldn't be long (probably on the weekend). Meanwhile, if you can find a bit of time to keep testing, that would be awesome of course :) If there are any other issues, I can then handle them all in one go.

Thanks for testing this!
